main event: A high-speed unidentified object was observed over Verona, Italy on 18 July 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as a flaming circular object moving across the sky at a 32-degree angle above the horizon., The object was very bright white in color with a bluish white tail that was about five times longer than the main body., The sighting lasted for about 5 seconds before the object disappeared from sight., At least 2 dependent children and several NCO personnel also observed the phenomenon., A US Army Major reported a similar sighting in the Livorno area on the same day.
witness description: a Colonel, 2 dependent children, several NCO personnel, and a US Army Major
